properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning Ended
properties.Summary:
Description: At 3:12 AM CST Doppler RADAR indicated that the thunderstorm that prompted the warning had weakened to below severe limits. Pea-sized hail is still likely with this thunderstorm. ###
Expires: 2019-08-25T10:14:41-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-25T09:15:41-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3527968374.2019
Area: R.M. of Loreburn including Elbow Loreburn and Hawarden, R.M. of Willner west of Davidson
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Wind Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Southerly winds gusting to near 90 kilometres per hour are expected this evening. ### Wind warnings are issued when there is a significant risk of damaging winds. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to QCstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #QCStorm.
Expires: 2019-08-26T00:09:50-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-25T08:10:50-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3567317362.2019
Area: Salluit
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter-sized hail. At 2:54 AM CST Doppler RADAR indicated that this severe thunderstorm was located near Loreburn and was moving toward the east at 40 km/h. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury.
Expires: 2019-08-25T11:29:22-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-25T08:56:22-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3928981673.2019
Area: R.M. of Loreburn including Elbow Loreburn and Hawarden, R.M. of Willner west of Davidson
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter-sized hail. At 2:30 AM CST Doppler RADAR indicated that this severe thunderstorm was located near Dunblane and was moving toward the east at 40 km/h. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury.
Expires: 2019-08-25T11:29:33-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-25T08:31:33-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.0706967185.2019
Area: R.M. of Coteau including Birsay and Danielson Prov. Park, R.M. of Loreburn including Elbow Loreburn and Hawarden
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Frost Advisory In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Frost may damage some crops in frost-prone areas. A very cool air mass will coincide with clearing skies and light winds tonight over Newfoundland's interior. This combination is expected to result in patchy frost as temperatures fall to within a couple degrees of freezing in low lying areas. ### Frost advisories are issued when temperatures are expected to reach the freezing mark during the growing season, leading to potential damage and destruction to plants and crops. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to NLstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #NLwx.
Expires: 2019-08-25T14:59:29-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-25T01:48:29-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.2410869451.2019
Area: Deer Lake - Humber Valley, Buchans and the interior, Grand Falls-Windsor and vicinity
properties.Author: Environment Canada
